item.title: Trump threatens 35% tariffs on Canadian goods
item.description: Trump has threatened blanket levies of 15% or 20% on most trade partners, and says he will soon announce new tariffs on the EU.

item.title: Death of Ukrainian conscript prompts row with Hungary
item.description: Allegations that the 45-year-old was beaten with iron bars, weeks after being forcibly conscripted, have been denied by Ukraine's military.

item.title: Russians tell the BBC how they think the Ukraine war will end
item.description: Russian victory is a key message at the 'Patriotic Festival' a few miles outside Moscow.

item.title: Dozens taken to hospital after suspected mass overdose in Baltimore
item.description: At least 27 people have been admitted to hospital, some of whom are in a critical condition.

item.title: Watch: Moment child gets stuck inside a claw machine
item.description: The child was rescued unharmed from the toy crane game in the US state of Ohio by first responders.
